title: Spotted: Cervélo S5 Seen With Visma-Lease a Bike Looks a Whole Lot Like the Current One
content:
Jonas Vingegaard and Victor Campenaerts spotted riding what appears to be a new Cervelo S5 aero bike with a few key changes.

Read the full article at Spotted: Cervélo S5 Seen With Visma-Lease a Bike Looks a Whole Lot Like the Current One on Velo.
author: Alvin Holbrook
